#summary HOWTO: Change the Credit and Debit column Labels.

= HOWTO: Change the Credit & Debit Column Labels =

If you don't like the "Credit" and "Debit" labels, go ahead and change them.

You can do this quickly within a Registry Tab.
  # Select the Account or Envelope you want to change the labels for in the left panel.
  # Double-Click the column header of the registry grid.
  # Change the name in the dialog.
  # Click done.

You can also change the labels by going into the Account Details or Envelope Details dialog under Edit in the menu, and changing the appropriate fields.
